DOC.brief_title: Open-Label , Placebo-Controlled , Parallel Group Study Healthy Volunteers Evaluate Effects Two Single MT 400 Naproxen Sodium Tablets
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , parallel group , single-center study . The study design consist screen treatment period . A total 42 ( approximately 21 sex ) non-smoking healthy volunteer age 18 - 35 , select treatment . Potential subject assess exposure ionize radiation work cytotoxic chemical , cell cycle time fall outside range 13 Â± 1.5 hour subject stable chromosomal rearrangement and/or abnormally high background chromosomal aberration frequency . Approximately 30 subject ( 10 per arm ) estimate need analysis .
